import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu' import { Apple, ChevronDown, Menu } from 'lucide-react' const APP_NAME = 'Cal AI' const APP_ICON = Apple const FEATURES = [ { title: 'How does Cal AI work?', content: 'When you take a picture with Cal AI, many things happen. First the depth sensor on your phone will figure out the volume of your food. Using that information, our AI model which was trained on thousands of food images will separate your meal into all the different parts and their proportions. Finally, our multimodal AI model will take everything in and finalize the results: figuring out the calories, protein, carbs, and fat in your meal.', image: 'https://www.calai.app/_image?href=%2F_astro%2Ffeature_image1.DSQBy9Wl.png&w=600&h=600&f=webp', }, { title: 'How accurate is Cal AI?', content: "Cal AI's image scanning feature is generally 90% accurate. That said, if you scan a food with hidden ingredients, like a smoothie or a soup, it will have a harder time. For such foods, you are better off using our describe feature which lets you type exactly what you ate, with any relevant information. You also could use our barcode scan feature or the food label scan feature. In case a result comes back inaccurate, you can always click the 'fix results' button to describe what was wrong so that our AI can fix it. This also helps us get better :)", image: 'https://www.calai.app/_image?href=%2F_astro%2Ffeature_image2.oRbVlSpq.png&w=600&h=800&f=webp', }, ] export default function RootPage() { return (
{/* MARK: Menu */}
{APP_NAME}
How does Cal AI work? How accurate is Cal AI?
{/* MARK: Call to action */}

Track your calories with just a picture.

Introducing Cal AI, the AI-powered app that simplifies calorie tracking. Snap a photo or scan a barcode, and Cal AI instantly calculates calories and nutrients. Stay on track with personalized insights and smart reminders to reach your fitness goals faster!

{/* MARK: Used by */}

Used by these Amazing people

{/* MARK: Features */} {FEATURES.map((feature) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.content}

))} {/* MARK: Download */}

Try Cal AI today.

Track your calories with just a picture.

) }
